attributes.action: Sack Jacqui Smith MP for alleged fraudulent expenses claims.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Sack Jacqui Smith for gross incompetence as MP and Home Secretary for the alleged fraudulent expenses claims (e.g. alleged second home, alleged cost of furniture, alleged cost of electrical items, alleged cost of bath plug, alleged cost of home entertainments inclusive of 18+ adult movies!), with the intent to milk the public funds dry (i.e. taxpayers monies), particularly under the current economic crisis with the U.K's ever increasing deficit!  If Prime Minister Gordon Brown's cabinet does not sack Jacqui Smith now, then the electorate up and down U.K may sack the whole of Labour Party at the next general election.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
